TEI.2.document_title: Samuel Stamps to Stephen F Austin, 08-28-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Samuel Stamps to Austin, Monticello, Miss., August 28, 1832 Inquiring about certain men indebted to him. (Omitted.)
